# SCNMorpherCalculationMode.normalized

**Case**

Target weights must be in the range between `0.0` and `1.0`, and the contribution of the base geometry to the morphed surface is related to the sum of target weights. This is the default mode.

## Declaration

```swift
case normalized
```

## Constants

- **SCNMorpherCalculationMode.additive**: Target weights may take on any value, and weighted contributions for each target are added to the base geometry,

items.description: Target weights may take on any value, and weighted contributions for each target are added to the base geometry,
items.name: SCNMorpherCalculationMode.additive
